Paneer Butter Masala.description: A rich and creamy tomato-based curry with soft paneer cubes, delicately spiced for a mild heat.

Sheer Korma.description: A rich and creamy dessert made with vermicelli, milk, dates, and nuts. A traditional Eid dish.

Gulab Jamun.description: Sweet and soft milk-based balls soaked in a fragrant sugar syrup, perfect for a delightful end to your meal.

Chicken Biryani.description: A fragrant and flavorful rice dish with tender chicken pieces, infused with aromatic spices and saffron. Spicy.

Mochi.description: Sweet glutinous rice cakes filled with a variety of fillings, including red bean paste.

Tempura.description: Battered and deep-fried seafood and vegetables, served with a dipping sauce. Crispy and delicious.

Aloo Gobi.description: A classic combination of potatoes and cauliflower, cooked with spices and herbs. Mildly spicy.

Onigiri.description: Rice balls typically filled with umeboshi (pickled plum), salmon, or other salty or sour ingredients, wrapped in nori.

Butter Chicken.description: Tender chicken pieces in a creamy tomato-based sauce, with a perfect balance of spices. Mildly spicy.

Miso Soup.description: Traditional Japanese soup consisting of a dashi stock into which softened miso paste is mixed, along with tofu, seaweed, and green onions.
